name: nes-chr-to-bmp
description: Open .nes files and extract chr ready to edit

scripts.dev: rm -r $npm_package_config_extensions/chr-to-bmp ; mkdir -p $npm_package_config_extensions/chr-to-bmp ; cp chr-to-bmp.lua $npm_package_config_extensions/chr-to-bmp ; cp package.json $npm_package_config_extensions/chr-to-bmp ; $npm_package_config_aseprite
scripts.build: 7z a -tzip chr-to-bmp.zip chr-to-bmp.lua package.json ; mv chr-to-bmp.zip chr-to-bmp.aseprite-extension
